name: EB_BFH_BDC_RECORDS
description: Each row of this table links the record of a user activity to the denial/correspondence record that the activity was performed on.

columns.name: BFH_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the activity history record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: EB_BDC_RECORD_ID
columns.description: Stores a list of Denial/Correspondence IDs the activity was performed on.
